isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - DESCRIPTION - Bunk Fluorescent and Reading Lights W/60 Inch Cantilever Sleeper

svcproc.title: Bunk Fluorescent and Reading Lights W/60 Inch Cantilever Sleeper
svcproc.para: The Bunk Fluorescent Light is a fluorescent light assembly designed to provide the main source of illumination in the sleeper. Two additional switches, one in each bunk, are located where they are accessible. A Reading Light is located in each of the two sleeper bunks to provide illumination for reading when the fluorescent lamp is turned OFF, or when additional light is needed.
